bio.title: Connecting Visual, Product and UI Design
bio.description:
Liz Chang is a Product Designer with a background in Graphic and Visual Design. She started her career in Hong Kong and subsequently completed her MFA in Graphic Design at the Academy of Art University in San Francisco.

Since then she has continued her career in San Francisco focused primarily on Product and Visual Design, working for agencies as well as web and mobile apps.

education.school: University of Central England in Birmingham
Hong Kong Institute of Vocational Education
education.degree: Higher Diploma, Product Design and Technology
